overview:
Matt Callaway is a product and marketing strategist with 15 years experience at start-ups and established companies in interactive entertainment and online media.

Matt is currently the CEO of AppTap, an app discovery and advertising technology start-up. Prior to AppTap, Matt led global product strategy for AOL’s Winamp, growing the property from 55M monthly unique users to 84.5M.

Before joining Winamp, Matt led online marketing and community at Electronic Arts for. He ran marketing and community for SegaSoft’s HEAT.net online gaming network prior to that. Matt was also a co-creator of UGO.com, later acquired by Hearst Interactive.
